humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor mass, which measures 2.2 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the 'maximum dimension invasive component' measures 2.2 cm, which falls within the criteria for T2 (tumor size >2 cm and ≤5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
